dailyQuotes: Invest in yourself, your knowledge, and your network; the returns are limitless.
In the world of crypto, the only constant is adaptation; stay ahead, or get left behind.
Every setback is a setup for a comeback in the volatile market of cryptocurrencies.

coinOfWeek.name: PulseChain
coinOfWeek.reason: Native coin of the PulseChain ecosystem showing strong on-chain activity and community growth
coinOfWeek.analysis: With increasing DeFi adoption and lower fees than Ethereum, PulseChain is positioned for growth in the current market cycle.
